title: My Launch client wont work?
body:
i tried to figure it out and i have uninstalled it and downloaded the client all over again but it wont show up with anything...
Please help.

replies.body: im with this avg virus thing my cousin told me to disable that then it works but if u keep on disabling it soon u wont need to disable it

Got this off the EuW forums
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/IFAGBbti-info-black-screen-on-launcher-avg-antivirus-user-please-check-here

UPDATE: Thanks to Bark Wahlberg, the root cause from AVG has been found. It seems to be some sort of download accelerator, which you can disable as follows:

Open up AVG (Double click on it in the task bar/bottom right)
Click the "Web" category
Click the cog icon under "Online Shield"
Uncheck "Enable AVG Accelerator"
Apply/OK, then relaunch LoL
OMG thank you soooooooooooooooooooooo much. I was so close to factory resting my comp but you are GOD. man i ow you one so THANKS :D
Have you tried letting it sit for five minutes?
i have tried leaving it open for like 3 hours but it still is blank.{{item:3070}}
Are you on a Mac? Riot are currently investigating this issue and searching for a solution.
